title: # 506 - Esther Povitsky & ME
itunes:title: # 506 - Esther Povitsky & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian, Esther Povitsky. We talk about sleeping in our parents bed for too long, what she was like in high school, Trash Tuesday, wellness retreats, and much more! 

 

Check out her podcast “Trash Tuesday” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/trash-tuesday-w-annie-esther-khalyla/id1570695066 

 

Follow Esther 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/esthermonster 

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/littleesther 

 

This episode is brought to you by Helix. Get up to $200 off all mattress orders and 2 free pillows at http://www.helixsleep.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com

 

This episode is also brought to you by Mint Mobile. Cut your wireless bill to $15 a month at http://www.mintmobile.com/bertcast 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Black Buffalo. Go to http://www.blackbuffalo.com and use the code “BERTCAST” at checkout for 25% off your first order

 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer
